SELECT *
FROM [DW_Prod].[lithia].[vw_Schedules_Detail]
WHERE ([Company_Name] LIKE ? AND [Current_Month] = ? AND [Acct] IN ('20300','20301','30215','22700','22701','22000','22030','22100','22400','22410','22420','22430','22440','22450','22470','22480','22490','22500','22505','22510','22520','22530','X21050','21400','21410','21415','21420','21430','21440','21450','21460','21470','21505','22010','D21000','D21015','D21430','D21460','D21500','D21505','D21510','D21600','D21630','D21700','21001','21010','21015','21020','21031','23300','24600','24610','24700','24710','24720','B20500','B20600','F21020','X21030','21500','G29800','R25500','21005','A21005','F21005','L21005','A21000','D21010','F21000','L21000','P21000','R21000','21100','21101','21120','G21100','20500','21000') AND [CoNo] NOT IN ('1','12','13','14','18','21','22','168','171','238','255','260','261','266','502','503','504','729','731') AND [Amt] <> '0' AND LEN ([Sched]) <3 AND [Post_Ahead_Flag] = '0') AND [Sched] NOT IN ('6') OR ([CoNo] = ? AND [Current_Month] = ? AND [Acct] IN ('20300','20301','30215','22700','22701','22000','22030','22100','22400','22410','22420','22430','22440','22450','22470','22480','22490','22500','22505','22510','22520','22530','X21050','21400','21410','21415','21420','21430','21440','21450','21460','21470','21505','22010','D21000','D21015','D21430','D21460','D21500','D21505','D21510','D21600','D21630','D21700','21001','21010','21015','21020','21031','23300','24600','24610','24700','24710','24720','B20500','B20600','F21020','X21030','21500','G29800','R25500','21005','A21005','F21005','L21005','A21000','D21010','F21000','L21000','P21000','R21000','21100','21101','21120','G21100','20500','21000') AND [CoNo] NOT IN ('1','12','13','14','18','21','22','168','171','238','255','260','261','266','502','503','504','729','731') AND [Amt] <> '0' AND LEN ([Sched]) <3 AND [Post_Ahead_Flag] = '0') AND [Sched] NOT IN ('6')
